---
title: Overview
---

```{python}
from plotnine import *
from plotnine.data import mpg
```

```{python}
(
    ggplot(mpg, aes("cty", "hwy")) +
    geom_point(mapping = aes(colour = "displ")) +
    geom_smooth(method = "lm", color="blue") +
    scale_color_continuous(cmap_name="viridis") +
    facet_grid("year ~ drv") +
    coord_fixed() +
    theme_minimal() +
    theme(panel_grid_minor = element_blank())
)
```

## Data

```{python}
#| output: false
ggplot(data=mpg)
```

## `aes()` mapping

```{python}
#| output: false
ggplot(data=mpg, mapping = aes(x = "cty", y = "hwy"))
```

## `geom_*()` objects

```{python}
(
    ggplot(mpg, aes("cty", "hwy")) +
    # to create a scatterplot
    geom_point() +
    # to fit and overlay a loess trendline
    geom_smooth(method = "lm", color="blue")
)
```

## `scale_*()` translations

```{python}
(
    ggplot(mpg, aes("cty", "hwy", color = "class")) +
    geom_point() +
    scale_color_brewer(type="qual", palette = "Dark2")
)
```

## `position_*()` adjustments

```{python}
(
    ggplot(mpg, aes("cty", "hwy", color = "class")) +
    geom_point(position=position_jitter())
)
```

## `facet_*()` subplots

```{python}
(
    ggplot(mpg, aes("cty", "hwy")) +
    geom_point() +
    facet_grid("year ~ drv")
)
```

## `coord_*()` projections

```{python}
(
    ggplot(mpg, aes("cty", "hwy")) +
    geom_point() +
    coord_fixed(xlim=[0, 40], ylim=[0, 40])
)
```

## `theme_*()` styling


```{python}
(
    ggplot(mpg, aes("cty", "hwy", colour = "class")) +
    geom_point() +
    theme_minimal() +
    theme(
        legend_position = "top",
        axis_line = element_line(linewidth = 0.75),
        axis_line_x = element_line(colour = "blue"),
    )
)
```

## Putting it together


```{python}
(
    ggplot(mpg, aes("cty", "hwy")) +
    geom_point(mapping = aes(colour = "displ")) +
    geom_smooth(method = "lm", color="blue") +
    scale_color_continuous(cmap_name="viridis") +
    facet_grid("year ~ drv") +
    coord_fixed() +
    theme_minimal() +
    theme(panel_grid_minor = element_blank())
)
```
